SELECT cc.cf_pk, cc.cf_code, cc.cf_code_type, COUNT(pro.product_pk) AS cf_product_count FROM classification cc LEFT JOIN products pro ON cc.cf_pk = pro.cf_fk GROUP BY cc.cf_pk, cc.cf_code_type ORDER BY cc.cf_code
